name: eleventy-base
description: This is the starting point for Eleventy projects

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:eleventy
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run serve
scripts.staging:
npm run build && echo 'User-agent: *
Disallow: /' > dist/robots.txt
scripts.bump:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version -m "Bumps version number to %s"
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version -m "Bumps version number to %s"
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version -m "Bumps version number to %s"

author: Martin Underhill
